addGroupMember(address,address,MatryxPla.details: Adds a user to a group

params.member: Member to add to the group

commit(address,address,MatryxPlatform.Da.details: Creates a new commit off of a parent

params.group: Name of the group to create

distributeReward(address,address,MatryxP.details: Distributes any pending MTX to all commit owners in the chain

params.commitHash: Commit hash to begin distributing funds back from

fork(address,address,MatryxPlatform.Info.details: Forks off of an existing commit and creates a new commit, sends MTX to all previous commit owners

params.group: Name of the group working on this branch

getCommit(address,address,MatryxPlatform.details: Returns commit data for the given hash

params.commitHash: Hash of the commit to return

getCommitByContentHash(address,address,M.details: Returns commit data for the given content hash

params.contentHash: Content hash commit was created from

getGroupName(address,address,MatryxPlatf.details: Returns group name for given hash

getRoundsSubmittedTo(address,address,Mat.details: Returns Round addresses the commit has been submitted to

params.commitHash: Hash of the commit to return the rounds of

params.group: Name of the group working on this branch
Name of the group to request access to

submitToTournament(address,address,Matry.details: Creates a commit and submits it to a Tournament
